General.Name: Foran Energy Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Foran Energy Group Co., Ltd. transports and sells natural gas in China. The company engages in the provision of energy services, such as oil products, hydrogen energy, thermal energy, photovoltaics, and energy storage; and research, development, and manufacture of fuel cells, hydrogen energy equipment, and furnace thermal equipment. It also provides pipeline inspection and information management, gas engineering and design, gas storage and peak shaving projects, extension projects, and energy saving and emission reduction services. The company holds 13 regional pipeline gas business franchise rights. The company was formerly known as Foshan Gas Group Co.,Ltd. and changed its name to Foran Energy Group Co., Ltd. in March 2020. Foran Energy Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Foshan, China.
General.Address: No.18, Nanhai Avenue Middle, Foshan, China, 528000
